description: It is unclear how the Belgian woman got hold of the contaminated bottle.
title: Belgian wine alert after woman dies from sip of MDMA drug
title_page: Belgian wine alert after woman dies from sip of MDMA drug - BBC News
maintext: They said the woman had died of a lethal amount of MDMA and MDA in her bloodstream and that a witness had said she had only taken a sip from the bottle because it tasted bad. The two drugs are synthetic substances and MDMA forms the base for ecstasy.
